title: THE KING OF FIGHTERS-A 2012 v1.0.1 APK+OBB

A SINGLE-PLAYER MODE RICH IN CONTENT
6 game modes are available for thousands of hours of enjoyment even when playing alone: Ã¢â‚¬Å“SINGLE BATTLEÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ for 1-on-1 fights, Ã¢â‚¬Å“TEAM BATTLEÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ for classic KOF 3-on-3 gameplay, Ã¢â‚¬Å“ENDLESSÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Mode to defeat as many opponents as possible with one character, "CHALLENGE" Mode to clear trials by fulfilling requirements, the newly introduced "TIME ATTACK" Mode to compete for the best clear times by winning 10 matches, and Ã¢â‚¬Å“TRAININGÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Mode to get accustomed to the Virtual Pad-based controls and practice your combos.

SIMPLE COMMANDS
The Virtual Pad recreates perfectly reproduces KOFÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s smooth controls.
